original: Linde, Carl Wilhelm Fredrik, redaktör, Göteborg, f. 4/4/90 i Mahnö av Wilhelm L. o. Anna Katarina Lundberg. G. 17 m. Ingrid Karin Johansson. Barn: Bo-Christer f. 18, Inga-Britt 20. — Tidigare banktj :man i Ghg, inedarb. i Bohusl. Tidn. 06-08, Nord. Idrrlif 07-13, utgav tidn. Idrott 13-16, medarb. i Idr :bladet sed. 16. Sekr. i IF Kamr. i Uddevalla 05, en av inititag. t. samt sekr. i Bohusl.-Dals idr:förb. 06, stift, av Malmöalliansen, ordf. i Malmö IFK fotb :utsk., sekr. i Skånska automobilklubben, sekr., kassör o. klubbm. i IFK Gbg, dess ordf. 20, sekr. i Gbgs atletklubb, kassör i Gbgs trän :komm., ordf. i Gbgs fotbiförb. o. Gbgsalliansen, presskommiss. v. Sv:es idr:spel 23, bild. Sv. bordtennisförb., dess ordf. 26-29, led. av styr. f. Sv. fotb:förb. sed. 20, sekr. i internat. uttagn :komm. 20-36 o. ordf. 37, ordf. o. cliefsinstr. i tekn. komm. sed. 31 o. utr :komni., sekr. i stadgeändr :ikomm., repr. v. flera kongr. i Internat. fotb:förb., rev. sed. 46, led. f. flera fotb rtrupper t. uti. På sin tid god friidr :man samt distr :mäst. i fotb. o. bandy. Första kl. bandy-, brottn:- o. fotb:domare. Skr.: Allt om fotboll (34), 100 mod. metoder. Pojkarnas fotbollbok m. fl. RVO, Sv. brottn :förb. GM, IFK Gbg GM, Gbgs FF GM, Gbgs distr. IF GM, Centr:förb. GM, Riksidr :förb. förtj :t. o. dipL, IFK centr:styr. förtj :t. m. m.
translated: Linde, Carl Wilhelm Fredrik, editor, Gothenburg, b. 4/4/90 in Mahnö to Wilhelm L. and Anna Katarina Lundberg. Married on the 17th with Ingrid Karin Johansson. Children: Bo-Christer b. 18, Inga-Britt b. 20. - Former bank employee in Gothenburg, inherited in Bohusl. Tidn. 06-08, Nord. Idrrlif 07-13, published the magazine Idrott 13-16, collaborator in Idr. Bladet since 16. Secretary in IF Kamr. in Uddevalla 05, one of the initiators and secretary in Bohusl.-Dals idr:förb. 06, founder of Malmöalliansen, chairman of Malmö IFK football committee, secretary of Skånska automobilklubben, secretary, treasurer, and club member in IFK Gothenburg, chairman since 20, secretary of Gothenburg athletics club, treasurer of Gothenburg sports committee, chairman of Gothenburg football association and Gothenburg alliance, press commissioner at Sv:es idr:spel 23, founder of Swedish table tennis association, chairman from 26-29, member of the board of the Swedish football association since 20, secretary of the international selection committee 20-36 and chairman 37, chairman and chief instructor in the technical committee since 31 and foreign committee, secretary of the constitutional changes committee, representative at several congresses of the International Football Association, reviewer since 46, member of several football teams for international matches. Was a good track athlete in his time and district champion in football and bandy. First class referee in bandy, wrestling, and football. Wrote: Allt om fotboll (34), 100 modern methods, Pojkarnas fotbollbok, and others. Receives the Royal Order of Vasa, Swedish wrestling association grand master, IFK Gothenburg grand master, Gothenburg Football Federation grand master, Gothenburg district IF grand master, Central association grand master, Swedish sports federation deserving, and diplomatic, IFK central board deserving, and more.
